00038 
00039 static const char* nonlinear_error 
00040  = "Attempt to use LinearHexahedron mapping function for a nonlinear element\n";
00041 
00042 EntityTopology LinearHexahedron::element_topology() const
00043   { return HEXAHEDRON; }
00044   
00045 int LinearHexahedron::num_nodes() const
00046   { return 8; }
00047 
00048 static inline int coeff_xi_sign( unsigned coeff )
00049   { return 2*(((coeff+1)/2)%2) - 1; }
00050 static inline int coeff_eta_sign( unsigned coeff )
00051   { return 2*((coeff/2)%2) - 1; }
00052 static inline int coeff_zeta_sign( unsigned coeff )
00053   { return 2*(coeff/4) - 1; }
00054 
00055 static void coefficients_at_corner( unsigned corner, 
00056                                     double* coeff_out,
00057                                     size_t* indices_out,
00058                                     size_t& num_coeff ) 
00059 {
00060   num_coeff = 1;
00061   coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00062   indices_out[0] = corner;
00063 }
00064   
00065 const unsigned xi = 0, eta = 1, zeta = 2;
00066 const int edge_dir[] = { xi, eta, xi, eta, zeta, zeta, zeta, zeta, xi, eta, xi, eta };
00067 const int edge_beg[]       = { 0, 1, 2, 3, 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 }; // start vertex by edge number
00068 const int edge_end[]       = { 1, 2, 3, 0, 4, 5, 6, 7, 5, 6, 7, 4 }; // end vetex by edge number
00069 const int edge_opposite[]  = {10,11, 8, 9, 6, 7, 4, 5, 2, 3, 0, 1 }; // opposite edge
00070 const int edge_beg_orth1[] = { 3, 5, 1, 7, 1, 0, 3, 2, 7, 1, 5, 3 }; // vtx adjacent to edge start in edge_dir[e]+1 direction
00071 const int edge_beg_orth2[] = { 4, 0, 6, 2, 3, 2, 1, 0, 0, 4, 2, 6 }; // vtx adjacent to edge start in edge_dir[e]+2 direction
00072 const int edge_end_orth1[] = { 2, 6, 0, 4, 5, 4, 7, 6, 6, 2, 4, 0 }; // vtx adjacent to edge end in edge_dir[e]+1 direction
00073 const int edge_end_orth2[] = { 5, 3, 7, 1, 7, 6, 5, 4, 1, 7, 3, 5 }; // vtx adjacent to edge end in edge_dir[e]+2 direction
00074 
00075 static void coefficients_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge, 
00076                                       double* coeff_out,
00077                                       size_t* indices_out,
00078                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00079 {
00080   num_coeff = 2;
00081   coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00082   coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00083   indices_out[0] = edge_beg[edge];
00084   indices_out[1] = edge_end[edge];
00085 }  
00086   
00087   
00088 const int face_vtx[6][4] = { { 0, 1, 4, 5 },  // face 0 vertices
00089                              { 1, 2, 5, 6 },  // face 1 vertices
00090                              { 2, 3, 6, 7 },  // face 2
00091                              { 0, 3, 4, 7 },  // face 3
00092                              { 0, 1, 2, 3 },  // face 4
00093                              { 4, 5, 6, 7 } };// face 5
00094 const int face_opp[6] = { 2, 3, 0, 1, 5, 4 };  // opposite faces on hex
00095 const int face_dir[6] = { eta, xi, eta, xi, zeta, zeta }; // normal direction
00096 
00097 static void coefficients_at_mid_face( unsigned face,
00098                                       double* coeff_out,
00099                                       size_t* indices_out,
00100                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00101 {
00102   num_coeff = 4;
00103   coeff_out[0] = 0.25;
00104   coeff_out[1] = 0.25;
00105   coeff_out[2] = 0.25;
00106   coeff_out[3] = 0.25;
00107   indices_out[0] = face_vtx[face][0];
00108   indices_out[1] = face_vtx[face][1];
00109   indices_out[2] = face_vtx[face][2];
00110   indices_out[3] = face_vtx[face][3];
00111 }
00112                                            
00113   
00114 
00115 static void coefficients_at_mid_elem( double* coeff_out,
00116                                       size_t* indices_out,
00117                                       size_t& num_coeff )
00118 {
00119   num_coeff = 8;
00120   coeff_out[0] = 0.125;
00121   coeff_out[1] = 0.125;
00122   coeff_out[2] = 0.125;
00123   coeff_out[3] = 0.125;
00124   coeff_out[4] = 0.125;
00125   coeff_out[5] = 0.125;
00126   coeff_out[6] = 0.125;
00127   coeff_out[7] = 0.125;
00128   indices_out[0] = 0;
00129   indices_out[1] = 1;
00130   indices_out[2] = 2;
00131   indices_out[3] = 3;
00132   indices_out[4] = 4;
00133   indices_out[5] = 5;
00134   indices_out[6] = 6;
00135   indices_out[7] = 7;
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 void LinearHexahedron::coefficients( Sample loc,
00140                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00141                                      double* coeff_out,
00142                                      size_t* indices_out,
00143                                      size_t& num_coeff,
00144                                      MsqError& err ) const
00145 {
00146   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00147     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00148     return;
00149   }
00150   
00151   switch (loc.dimension) {
00152     case 0:
00153       coefficients_at_corner( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00154       break;
00155     case 1:
00156       coefficients_at_mid_edge( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00157       break;
00158     case 2:
00159       coefficients_at_mid_face( loc.number, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00160       break;
00161     case 3:
00162       coefficients_at_mid_elem( coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00163       break;
00164     default:
00165       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00166   }
00167 }
00168     
00169 
00170 static void derivatives_at_corner( unsigned corner, 
00171                                    size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00172                                    MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00173                                    size_t& num_vtx )
00174 {
00175   const int   xi_sign = coeff_xi_sign(corner);
00176   const int  eta_sign = coeff_eta_sign(corner);
00177   const int zeta_sign = coeff_zeta_sign(corner);
00178   const int offset = 4*(corner/4);
00179   //const int adj_in_xi   = offset + (9 - corner)%4;
00180   const int adj_in_xi   = corner + 1 - 2*(corner%2);
00181   const int adj_in_eta  = 3 + 2*offset - (int)corner;
00182   const int adj_in_zeta = corner - zeta_sign*4;
00183   
00184   num_vtx = 4;
00185   vertex_indices_out[0] = corner;
00186   vertex_indices_out[1] = adj_in_xi;
00187   vertex_indices_out[2] = adj_in_eta;
00188   vertex_indices_out[3] = adj_in_zeta;
00189   
00190   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][0] =   xi_sign;
00191   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][1] =  eta_sign;
00192   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][2] = zeta_sign;
00193   
00194   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][0] =  -xi_sign ;
00195   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][1] =       0.0;
00196   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][2] =       0.0;
00197   
00198   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][0] =       0.0;
00199   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][1] = -eta_sign;
00200   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][2] =       0.0;
00201   
00202   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][0] =       0.0;
00203   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][1] =       0.0;
00204   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][2] =-zeta_sign;
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00208 static void derivatives_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge, 
00209                                      size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00210                                      MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00211                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00212 {
00213   const int direction = edge_dir[edge];
00214   const int ortho1    = (direction+1)%3;
00215   const int ortho2    = (direction+2)%3;
00216   const int vtx = edge_beg[edge];
00217   const int signs[] = { coeff_xi_sign(vtx), coeff_eta_sign(vtx), coeff_zeta_sign(vtx) };
00218   const int sign_dir = signs[direction];
00219   const int sign_or1 = signs[ortho1   ];
00220   const int sign_or2 = signs[ortho2   ];
00221 
00222   num_vtx = 6;
00223   vertex_indices_out[0] = edge_beg[edge];
00224   vertex_indices_out[1] = edge_end[edge];
00225   vertex_indices_out[2] = edge_beg_orth1[edge];
00226   vertex_indices_out[3] = edge_end_orth1[edge];
00227   vertex_indices_out[4] = edge_beg_orth2[edge];
00228   vertex_indices_out[5] = edge_end_orth2[edge];
00229   
00230   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][direction] =  sign_dir;
00231   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][ortho1   ] =  sign_or1 * 0.5;
00232   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][ortho2   ] =  sign_or2 * 0.5;
00233   
00234   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][direction] = -sign_dir;
00235   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][ortho1   ] =  sign_or1 * 0.5;
00236   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][ortho2   ] =  sign_or2 * 0.5;
00237  
00238   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][direction] =             0.0;
00239   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][ortho1   ] = -sign_or1 * 0.5;
00240   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][ortho2   ] =             0.0;
00241  
00242   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][direction] =             0.0;
00243   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][ortho1   ] = -sign_or1 * 0.5;
00244   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][ortho2   ] =             0.0;
00245  
00246   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][direction] =             0.0;
00247   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][ortho1   ] =             0.0;
00248   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][ortho2   ] = -sign_or2 * 0.5;
00249  
00250   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][direction] =             0.0;
00251   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][ortho1   ] =             0.0;
00252   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][ortho2   ] = -sign_or2 * 0.5;
00253 }
00254 
00255 
00256 static void derivatives_at_mid_face( unsigned face, 
00257                                      size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00258                                      MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00259                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00260 {
00261   const int vtx_signs[4][3] = { { coeff_xi_sign  (face_vtx[face][0]),
00262                                   coeff_eta_sign (face_vtx[face][0]),
00263                                   coeff_zeta_sign(face_vtx[face][0]) },
00264                                 { coeff_xi_sign  (face_vtx[face][1]),
00265                                   coeff_eta_sign (face_vtx[face][1]),
00266                                   coeff_zeta_sign(face_vtx[face][1]) },
00267                                 { coeff_xi_sign  (face_vtx[face][2]),
00268                                   coeff_eta_sign (face_vtx[face][2]),
00269                                   coeff_zeta_sign(face_vtx[face][2]) },
00270                                 { coeff_xi_sign  (face_vtx[face][3]),
00271                                   coeff_eta_sign (face_vtx[face][3]),
00272                                   coeff_zeta_sign(face_vtx[face][3]) } };
00273   const int ortho_dir = face_dir[face];
00274   const int face_dir1 = (ortho_dir+1) % 3;
00275   const int face_dir2 = (ortho_dir+2) % 3;
00276   const int ortho_sign = vtx_signs[0][ortho_dir];  // same for all 4 verts
00277   
00278   num_vtx = 8;
00279   vertex_indices_out[0] = face_vtx[face][0];
00280   vertex_indices_out[1] = face_vtx[face][1];
00281   vertex_indices_out[2] = face_vtx[face][2];
00282   vertex_indices_out[3] = face_vtx[face][3];
00283   vertex_indices_out[4] = face_vtx[face_opp[face]][0];
00284   vertex_indices_out[5] = face_vtx[face_opp[face]][1];
00285   vertex_indices_out[6] = face_vtx[face_opp[face]][2];
00286   vertex_indices_out[7] = face_vtx[face_opp[face]][3];
00287   
00288   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][ortho_dir] = ortho_sign * 0.25;
00289   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][face_dir1] = vtx_signs[0][face_dir1] * 0.5;
00290   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][face_dir2] = vtx_signs[0][face_dir2] * 0.5;
00291   
00292   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][ortho_dir] = ortho_sign * 0.25;
00293   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][face_dir1] = vtx_signs[1][face_dir1] * 0.5;
00294   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][face_dir2] = vtx_signs[1][face_dir2] * 0.5;
00295   
00296   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][ortho_dir] = ortho_sign * 0.25;
00297   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][face_dir1] = vtx_signs[2][face_dir1] * 0.5;
00298   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][face_dir2] = vtx_signs[2][face_dir2] * 0.5;
00299   
00300   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][ortho_dir] = ortho_sign * 0.25;
00301   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][face_dir1] = vtx_signs[3][face_dir1] * 0.5;
00302   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][face_dir2] = vtx_signs[3][face_dir2] * 0.5;
00303   
00304   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][ortho_dir] = -ortho_sign * 0.25;
00305   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][face_dir1] = 0.0;
00306   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][face_dir2] = 0.0;
00307   
00308   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][ortho_dir] = -ortho_sign * 0.25;
00309   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][face_dir1] = 0.0;
00310   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][face_dir2] = 0.0;
00311   
00312   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][ortho_dir] = -ortho_sign * 0.25;
00313   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][face_dir1] = 0.0;
00314   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][face_dir2] = 0.0;
00315   
00316   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][ortho_dir] = -ortho_sign * 0.25;
00317   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][face_dir1] = 0.0;
00318   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][face_dir2] = 0.0;
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void derivatives_at_mid_elem( size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00322                                      MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00323                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00324 
00325 {
00326   num_vtx = 8;
00327   vertex_indices_out[0] = 0;
00328   vertex_indices_out[1] = 1;
00329   vertex_indices_out[2] = 2;
00330   vertex_indices_out[3] = 3;
00331   vertex_indices_out[4] = 4;
00332   vertex_indices_out[5] = 5;
00333   vertex_indices_out[6] = 6;
00334   vertex_indices_out[7] = 7;
00335   
00336   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][0] = -0.25;
00337   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][1] = -0.25;
00338   d_coeff_d_xi_out[0][2] = -0.25;
00339 
00340   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][0] =  0.25;
00341   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][1] = -0.25;
00342   d_coeff_d_xi_out[1][2] = -0.25;
00343 
00344   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][0] =  0.25;
00345   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][1] =  0.25;
00346   d_coeff_d_xi_out[2][2] = -0.25;
00347 
00348   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][0] = -0.25;
00349   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][1] =  0.25;
00350   d_coeff_d_xi_out[3][2] = -0.25;
00351 
00352   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][0] = -0.25;
00353   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][1] = -0.25;
00354   d_coeff_d_xi_out[4][2] =  0.25;
00355 
00356   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][0] =  0.25;
00357   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][1] = -0.25;
00358   d_coeff_d_xi_out[5][2] =  0.25;
00359 
00360   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][0] =  0.25;
00361   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][1] =  0.25;
00362   d_coeff_d_xi_out[6][2] =  0.25;
00363 
00364   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][0] = -0.25;
00365   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][1] =  0.25;
00366   d_coeff_d_xi_out[7][2] =  0.25;
00367 }

00369 
00370 void LinearHexahedron::derivatives( Sample loc,
00371                                     NodeSet nodeset,
00372                                     size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00373                                     MsqVector<3>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00374                                     size_t& num_vtx,
00375                                     MsqError& err ) const
00376 {
00377   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00378     MSQ_SETERR(err)(nonlinear_error, MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT );
00379     return;
00380   }
00381   
00382   switch (loc.dimension) {
00383     case 0:
00384       derivatives_at_corner( loc.number, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00385       break;
00386     case 1:
00387       derivatives_at_mid_edge( loc.number, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00388       break;
00389     case 2:
00390       derivatives_at_mid_face( loc.number, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00391       break;
00392     case 3:
00393       derivatives_at_mid_elem( vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00394       break;
00395     default:
00396       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00397   }
00398 }
00399 
00400 void LinearHexahedron::ideal( Sample , 
00401                               MsqMatrix<3,3>& J,
00402                               MsqError&  ) const
00403 {
00404   J(0,0) = J(1,1) = J(2,2) = 1.0;
00405   J(1,0) = J(0,1) = J(0,2) = 0.0;
00406   J(2,0) = J(2,1) = J(1,2) = 0.0;
00407 }
